commit.message:
h8300.c (h8_push_ops): Move inside h8300_init_once.

	* config/h8300/h8300.c (h8_push_ops): Move inside
	h8300_init_once.
	(h8_pop_ops): Likewise.
	(h8_move_ops): Likewise.

From-SVN: r49453

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,10 @@
+2002-02-02  Kazu Hirata  <kazu@hxi.com>
+
+	* config/h8300/h8300.c (h8_push_ops): Move inside
+	h8300_init_once.
+	(h8_pop_ops): Likewise.
+	(h8_move_ops): Likewise.

 2002-02-02  Kazu Hirata  <kazu@hxi.com>
 
 	* config/h8300/h8300.c (os_task): Make it static.
